description: Recursive sequence of indices of Proth primes a*2^b - 1.
comments: Searched up to 76856*2^100000 - 1 (9607*2^100003 - 1 is the format in the Yves Gallot's Proth Program)
links: Y. Gallot, Proth.exe: Windows Program for Finding Large Primes
formula: a(n) = least integer greater than a(n-1) such that a(n-1)*2^a(n) - 1 is prime
author: Chad Davis (cad16(AT)po.cwru.edu)
